goals__remit:
Adif is the administrator of railway infrastructures in Spain. It is a public business entity, under the Ministry of Development (Transport), and in charge of the management of the railway network of General Interest. Among its tasks are, among other things, traffic management, capacity allocation or the construction of new sections when so ordered by the Ministry of Public Works. 
Adif also represents Adif AV, the entity in charge of the construction of the new high speed lines in Spain.
